view.screens.sprites

Interface SpriteManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpriteManagerImpl

    public interface SpriteManager
    Methods available to dynamic scenes to manage drawn entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSprite(ControlCommunication addedEntity)
      This method tracks a new entity and initializes it.
      javafx.scene.layout.Pane getEntitiesPane()
      This method returns the Pane where entities are represented.
      boolean isTracked(int code)
      This method checks if an entity is already tracked.
      void pauseAllSprites()
      This method pauses the animation of all animated entities.
      void resumeAllSprites()
      This method resumes the animation of all paused animated entities.
      void updateSpriteState(int code, Actions action, ViewPhysicalProperties properties)
      This method updates an entity position and, if the entity is animated, his animation.

    • Method Detail

      • addSprite

        void addSprite(ControlCommunication addedEntity)
        This method tracks a new entity and initializes it.
        Parameters:
        addedEntity - Informations about the new entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the entity was already tracked.

      • updateSpriteState

        void updateSpriteState(int code,
                       Actions action,
                       ViewPhysicalProperties properties)
        This method updates an entity position and, if the entity is animated, his animation.
        Parameters:
        code - Entity's ID
        action - Entity's new action.
        properties - Entity's position and direction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the entity was not in tracking.

      • isTracked

        boolean isTracked(int code)
        This method checks if an entity is already tracked.
        Parameters:
        code - Entity's ID
        Returns:
        True if it's tracked, false otherwise.

      • pauseAllSprites

        void pauseAllSprites()
        This method pauses the animation of all animated entities.

      • resumeAllSprites

        void resumeAllSprites()
        This method resumes the animation of all paused animated entities.

      • getEntitiesPane

        javafx.scene.layout.Pane getEntitiesPane()
        This method returns the Pane where entities are represented.
        Returns:
        Entities' Pane.
